# Welcome!

* These demos are based on the [NeuROM-py code](https://pypi.org/project/NeuROM-Py/) [![DOI](https://zenodo.org/badge/DOI/10.5281/zenodo.14218478.svg)](https://doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.14218478).
* The notebooks can be executed online with binder [![Binder](https://mybinder.org/badge_logo.svg)](https://mybinder.org/v2/gh/AlexandreDabySeesaram/Simplified_NeuROM_demos/main?urlpath=lab/tree/./demos/) (no download required).
